bookSeries: 新世紀エヴァンゲリオン / Neon Genesis Evangelion #1
bookAuthors: Yoshiyuki Sadamoto, Hideaki Anno, Mari Morimoto
Plot: Evangelion, Vol. 1, contains a Japanese sound FX glossary plus special bonus commentary by series mecha designer Ikuto Yamashita, as well as the famous "confession letter" written by director Hideaki Anno in the months before the original TV series premiere that laid out his deeply personal motivations to make Evangelion.
